function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Neoliberal surveillance mechanism through big data","Impact":"Infringement of privacy, potential abuse of data, and citizen distrust","Mitigation":"Ethical data collection and usage, transparency in data use, and consent-based data gathering","Technologies":"Privacy-preserving algorithms, data anonymization techniques, and secure data storage","People":"Citizens, residents, and individuals in urban areas","Owner":"Government, urban planners, and data collection agencies"},{"Description":"COVID-19 crisis management using IoT and smart city data","Impact":"Ineffective response to the pandemic, misinterpretation of data, and reliance on faulty information","Mitigation":"Data validation and verification, cross-referencing with traditional public health methods, and expert oversight","Technologies":"Real-time data analytics, predictive modeling, and health data integration","People":"Public health officials, policymakers, and citizens","Owner":"Public health agencies, government, and data analytics organizations"}]}
